oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music Night - 2015-05-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music Night program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 21, 2015.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chase Bryant;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Guest host is Chase Bryant. Performances include; Just Open Up Your Ears (Tim Buppert, Lindsay Damon) -- Always Be On Your Side (Claire Wyndham, Hugo Turro-Serrano) -- Boy Loving (Bob Spanburgh, Emma Dickenson) -- What’s Inside a Maraca? (Jerry Vandiver, Moises Alvares Garza and John Sykes) -- Creepy, but Cool (Kathy Hussey, Abby Hallaman) -- Crime of Passion (Leanne Rayo, Hayley Roberts) -- Can’t Bring Me Down (Doug and Telisha Williams, Alexis Vaughan) -- Move On (Sandy Ramos, Lucy Wallace) -- I Like Money (Mason Douglas, Calvin Goliday) -- Sweet and Southern (Matt Vrba, Kendall Weaver) -- Fold Me Close (Janine Le Clair, Conner McCabe and Slater Brandon) -- My Red Kayak (Jesse Hunter, Nathan Sweeton) -- My Pug Gertie (Shane Adams, Virginia Callen and Ella Clare Merkel) -- My Blind Side and the Best Side (Misty Rae and Jason Carson, Audrey Diehl) -- #Selfie (Lacey Williams, Jack Evans and Jackson Rowley) -- Please Come To Boston (Chase Bryant)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bryant, Chase; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
